_sText:
********THIS IS MY LATEST RELEASE*********



Escape on the flying square it comes to both bases' roofs and there is a button to kill all survivors if you get on the flying square.


Updates from zm_2fort_escape

1. New tram that can go from base to base, shoot to activate

2. Added two new barricade spots on 2nd floor of each place

3. Flying square arrives in 130 seconds

4. Fixz0red killzones

5. Updated switches

6. Decreased size of map

7. Added grenades to landing pads.
